title: About
text:
Hello! My name is Ulaş. I’m a technology enthusiast currently pursuing my Master’s degree in Computer Science.
This blog is my digital space to explore the wide world of technology. As a computer science student, I’m fascinated by many topics—from software development and system architecture to the latest advancements in AI. Here, I’ll share my projects, thoughts on interesting tech, and what I’m learning along the way. Thanks for stopping by!

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
